duties_responsibilities.duty: Render professional nursing care and direct/indirect patient care using the nursing process.
Direct and supervise other team members and collaborate with multidisciplinary team members.
Communicate clearly and openly, building relationships to promote a collaborative environment.
Be accountable for performance, always looking for ways to improve the patient experience.
Take initiative for professional growth and be engaged and eager to build a winning team.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of professional nursing with a current license to practice professional nursing in Texas or eligibility to do so. BSN Preferred.
